name: ShockCast
body:
ShockCast is developed by [Orry Verducci](http://www.orryverducci.co.uk/) primarily for use by [Shock Radio](http://www.shockradio.co.uk/). ShockCast supports Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012. .Net Framework 4.5 is required.

Building From Source
--------------------
This project has been developed in Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 RC, using .Net Framework 4.5.

Before building ensure you have the required prerequisites:
* BASS, BASSenc and BASSWMA, placed in the x86 and x64 folders, available from http://www.un4seen.com/.
* BASS.NET, available from http://bass.radio42.com/.
